Widgetize.PluginDescription: Display any Matomo report in your website or app with a simple "embed" HTML tag.
Widgetize.ViewAccessRequired: This user has at least some write access. Only tokens of users who have only view access can be used. Check %1$s for more info.
Widgetize.TopLinkTooltip: Export Matomo reports as widgets and embed the dashboard in your app as an iframe.
Widgetize.TooHighAccessLevel: This user has super-user access. Embedding widgets with super-user token authentication is not allowed. %1$sCheck the FAQ for more info.%2$s
